t: Amazon’s Glow shutdown will make the devices useless at the end of 2022 | The Verge
s: October 20, 2022 - The child-friendly video calling gadget will stop working after December 31st. While Amazon is refunding anyone who bought a Glow, this is another reminder to beware of entirely cloud-dependent hardware in the smart home.

t: r/Anticonsumption on Reddit: Amazon discontinued Glow, its $300 touch-screen projector gadget for kids, shutting down support on Dec. 31, 2022. Owners will get a refund and are asked to recycle it.
s: October 24, 2022 - Nike says they're cutting down on bot sales by cancelling orders and charging restock fees in some cases. As a brand new collector, this is encouraging. What does everyone else think? ... A subreddit for sneaker lovers. ... Avoided Amazon purchase today...

t: Review: Amazon Glow — Techsponential
s: June 27, 2023 - Amazon Glow would benefit from a handle on the back for portability, along with an optional storage case for the main unit, mat, and power supply. There is no provision for local multiplayer. During a recent playdate, my kid solved that problem by insisting that I set up the Glow app on his tablet.

t: Amazon kills its interactive, video-calling device, Amazon Glow, launched last year | TechCrunch
s: October 10, 2022 - Just over a year after its debut, Amazon is discontinuing its interactive, video-calling device for kids and families, the Amazon Glow. First introduced at Amazon’s annual hardware event last year, the device promised a unique way for kids to use technology when on video calls with other ...

t: Amazon Glow Shut Down: Exploring Alternatives to the Interactive Video-Calling Device - Zoog
s: March 26, 2024 - In March 2022, Amazon released its new product, Amazon Glow, an interactive video-calling device for customers in the U.S. as published on businesswire. This new device offered a virtual space for kids to play games, learn, read, and participate in visual arts activities.

t: Amazon’s Glow goes the way of the Fire Phone and dodo - Ars Technica
s: October 5, 2022 - You can't buy the Glow on Amazon's website anymore. According to Bloomberg, the device was on sale for $150 (down from $300) on Tuesday before it became listed as unavailable later that day.

s: October 4, 2022 - Amazon is discontinuing the Amazon Glow, its video calling / interactive gaming device designed to let families interact remotely with each other. The device was announced just over a year ago.
